info.title: Philanthropy Data Commons API
info.description: An API for a common data platform to make the process of submitting data requests to funders less burdensome for organizations seeking grants.

license.name: GNU Affero General Public License v3.0 only

authenticationIdParam.name: authenticationId
authenticationIdParam.description: The authentication ID associated with the desired user.

countParam.name: _count
countParam.description: The maximum number of items that should appear per page or request.

searchParam.name: _content
searchParam.description: A web-search formatted string to select specific entities returned.

organizationParam.name: organization
organizationParam.description: A reference (ID) to an existing organization entity.

proposalParam.name: proposal
proposalParam.description: A reference (ID) to an existing proposal entity.

createdByParam.name: createdBy
createdByParam.description: A reference (ID) to a user entity, or 'me'.

auth.description: The OAuth 2.0 (and OpenID Connect) Authorization Code flow.

createdBy.description: The id of the PDC user that created this bulk upload
The id of the PDC user that created this proposal
The id of the PDC user that created this bulk upload

description.example: The first name of the applicant

localizations.description: Keys can be expected to be IETF language tags.

total.description: The total number of requested resources that exist in the database, across all pages.

get.summary: Gets a list of application forms.

200.description: All application forms currently registered in the PDC.

201.description: The new application form that was created, with populated fields

401.description: Authentication was not provided or was invalid.

409.description: There was a unique key conflict.

422.description: The application references entities that do not exist in the database.

parameters.name: applicationFormId
parameters.description: The PDC-generated ID of an application form.

get.summary: Gets a list of bulk uploads.

200.description: Requested bulk uploads registered in the PDC.

401.description: Authentication was not provided or was invalid.

post.summary: Registers a bulk upload. This lets PDC ingest data previously uploaded via a POST to the /presignedPostRequests endpoint.

401.description: Authentication was not provided or was invalid.
Authentication was not provided or was invalid.

post.summary: Adds a new OrganizationProposal associated with a specific organization.

401.description: Authentication was not provided or was invalid.

200.description: Organizations currently registered in the PDC.

401.description: Authentication was not provided or was invalid.

201.description: The new organization that was created

401.description: Authentication was not provided or was invalid.

parameters.name: organizationId
parameters.description: The PDC-generated ID of an organization.

401.description: Authentication was not provided or was invalid.

201.description: The presigned post request. Use the contents of this JSON to POST form data to S3. After posting data to S3, use the /bulkUploads endpoint to let PDC ingest the data.

401.description: Authentication was not provided or was invalid.

200.description: A set of proposals currently registered in the PDC.

401.description: Authentication was not provided or was invalid.

201.description: The new proposal that was created

401.description: Authentication was not provided or was invalid.

409.description: There was a unique key conflict.

422.description: The proposal references entities that do not exist in the database.

parameters.name: proposalId
parameters.description: The PDC-generated ID of a proposal.

201.description: The new proposal version that was created, with populated field values

401.description: Authentication was not provided or was invalid.

422.description: The proposal version references entities that do not exist in the database.

get.summary: Gets a list of base fields.

200.description: All base fields currently registered in the PDC.

201.description: The new base field that was created.

401.description: Authentication was not provided or was invalid.

409.description: There was a unique key conflict.

parameters.name: baseFieldId
parameters.description: The PDC-generated ID of a base field.

401.description: Authentication was not provided or was invalid.

404.description: The base field could not be found.

get.summary: Gets a list of data providers.

parameters.name: dataProviderShortCode
parameters.description: The short code of a data provider.

put.summary: Creates or updates a new data provider.

parameters.name: dataProviderShortCode
parameters.description: The short code of a data provider.

201.description: The new data provider that was created.

401.description: Authentication was not provided or was invalid.

parameters.name: dataProviderId
parameters.description: The PDC-generated ID of a data provider.

parameters.name: funderShortCode
parameters.description: The short code of a funder.

put.summary: Creates or updates a new funder.

parameters.name: funderShortCode
parameters.description: The short code of a funder.

201.description: The new funder that was created.

401.description: Authentication was not provided or was invalid.

get.summary: Gets a list of base fields localizations for a given basefield.

parameters.name: baseFieldId
parameters.description: The PDC-generated ID of a base field.

200.description: All base field localizations for a given base field in the PDC.

404.description: The base field could not be found.

put.summary: Creates or updates a base field localization.

parameters.name: baseFieldId
parameters.description: The PDC-generated ID of a base field.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The valid IETF language tag for a base field localization

201.description: The new base field localization that was created.

400.description: Required fields were not provided or were incorrectly formatted.

409.description: There was a unique key conflict.

404.description: The base field could not be found.

200.description: A list of known funding opportunities.

201.description: The new opportunity that was created.

401.description: Authentication was not provided or was invalid.

parameters.name: opportunityId
parameters.description: The PDC-generated ID of an opportunity, RFC, potential award or grant, etc.

get.summary: Gets a list of platform provider responses.

parameters.name: externalId
parameters.description: The external ID that has been associated with the response.  This ID is arbitrarily formatted, and cannot be predicted without knowledge of specific PDC data.

200.description: A list of cached platform provider responses.

post.summary: Adds a new platform provider response.

201.description: The new platform provider response that was created.

400.description: Required fields were not provided or were incorrectly formatted.

401.description: Authentication was not provided or was invalid.

200.description: All sources currently registered in the PDC.

201.description: The new source that was created.

401.description: Authentication was not provided or was invalid.

parameters.name: sourceId
parameters.description: The PDC-generated ID of a source.
